caption: Best pupusas in town! Their gluten-free pizza crust is incredible as well!

Excellent New York style pizza with some great slice options. Had a buffalo chicken finger slice and also a slice with tortellini. The slice of tortellini was something I've never had.It was interesting and really good. Definitely go check this place out if you're stopping through ithaca
Somewhat unconventional compared to other pizza places in Ithaca, but great food nonetheless. We ordered pepperoni slices and they were very tasty. Highly recommended!
Pizza is among the best that I have had. It sounds like At Rome But the crust us good/ lots of stuff and T A S T Y
White pie, fresh tomato and basil. Get some. Very good.

Fantastic atmosphere when you walk in. It truly felt like I was about to have a great slice of pizza. Then I saw the slice as I prepared to pay for it. It was looking pretty good. An absolute excellent pricing for a single slice. But as I …

The pizzeria offers a wide variety of pizza slices. The serving sizes are good and the toppings are fresh. They are very generous with their cheese and toppings. However, I wasn't very impressed with their crust. It lacked flavor and wasn't …
Favorite pizza in Ithaca and very friendly staff!
Great vegan slices! Vegan cheese was yummy and so was the crust!
What a local treasure to have in our community. Besides the amazing pizza do try the Latino plates like meatballs and papusas.
This Salvadoran place is probably the only good Latinx food place in ith. the pupusas are AMAZING!

I've eaten pizza from Pizza Aroma a few times now. Every time I do, I think I'm eating cardboard. NY-style crust is great and I've got nothing against it but this pizza just lacks the depth of flavor that makes good pizza good.  There are too many pizza options in Ithaca to settle for Pizza Aroma.
Good small pizza place.
Found crockcroch's leg in pizza. The owner not took any responsible. I thrown up and never go back.
Great food! Always has the best selection of slices, convenient, friendly, and owned/staffed by very hardworking people who handle their business with respect for all in every circumstance.

I ordered a veggie pizza with no cheese (vegan). Unfortunately was immediately turned off by the amount of spinach when I opened the box.. it was like a thick blanket of wet wilted spinach and the tiniest amount of other toppings. Only a …

Pizza is terrific. Authentic crispy NY style crust. Also offer Latin foods. When I have praised the food to locals, their response has been "it looks dirty."  It's not, but the dining area could use some updating.
Pizza Aroma has great gourmet pizza and El Salvadoran food. I especially love the pupusas
Best pizza in Ithaca 🍕
Excellent pizza!! Delicious crust
Best Mexican food and pizza I've had in the two months that I've lived in Ithaca
I gave this a 5.1 on the "One Bite" app. Good pizza not great.
Great pizza, especially the salad pizza.
Just like NYC pizza.
This is my go-to delivery place for pizza in Ithaca. The food is always great, the people who work here are really nice, and the food always arrives on time.
Was good salvadoran food could use alittle more zip.  Vegan pizza made with dia cheese but that would be my only complaint  the crust ans sause where good
Good pizza
It was nice in here, amd the staff were super friendly. Totally recommend this as a stop when downtown.

Visiting Ithaca - I returned to Pizza Aroma and expectations met yet again! I remember when the place opened 22 years ago- toppings always fresh and the same guy still behind the counter making and serving the pizza. Now gluten free- I knew …
Awesome pizza, especially the black bean avocado slice!
Good pizza. Also Latin American/Salvadorean food. Nice people. Quality food.
Nice out of the way place for pizza.
Warm and friendly service. Good food, enjoy!
Excellent vegan pizza slices with many other options as well. Great for a fast inexpensive meal.
Black bean avocado pizza is a must! All the others are good too
Great pupusas!
They have Latin Food here!!! The best in Ithaca. So Yummy.
Wonderful variety, nice atmosphere, decent prices. I haven't had better pizza anywhere.
I just ordered a pizza through grubhub. It was awesome the baked potato pizza is perhaps the best thing ever
My favorite pizza place in Ithaca for last two decades.

Great pizza. Thin crust, NYC style, but they do the whole cornmeal crust thing, giving the crust both a bit more crunch and a bit more toothiness. Selection of toppings are top notch, with large selection by the spice and some unique …
Best by the slice pizza in Ithaca.
A great variety of hearty pizza slices including vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free. Also have home-made El Salvadorian dishes.

The pizza was good and reasonably priced. It would have been nice to see the owner wear some gloves while handling our food though. We told him what slices we wanted and he just started grabbing away. At least wash your hands for us to see before you start touching the food. The coca cola was delicious and FLAT
Way too much corn meal on their pizza. It's  gross.
The meat pie was great
Dingy hole-in-the-wall with good pizza and friendly service. They can make pizzas both gluten-free and dairy-free.

This place pizza is not worth buying!! The wings are like slimy meat with no crispyness to it. Call the owner and told him about this Disgusting food that he made himself, and he just hung up on me. People stay away from this place. Your going to waste your money on nasty food that’s over priced.
Truly the best pizza in Ithaca. Many gourmet quality pizza slices to choose from. Very friendly service. A great place for a quick bite or a meal.
(Translated by Google) Ok pizza.  (Original) Ok pizza.
Awesome :)
Don't let the dingy appearance of the signs and restaurant fool you.  Great gourmet pizza,  scrumptious salvadorian food,  all at a great price with friendly service.
Delivered the Best Pizza I have had in awhile to our boat at Treman Marine Park,made for great lunch on back to Fayetteville ,Thanks Againn😀🍷
Good taste, overall.  Could've done without the crackermeal on the crust.
Tasty slices with interesting combinations of fresh ingredients (e.g. black beans and fresh avocado). One slice is a meal for me.
It was delicious!
Good pizza and tamales. Also serve other central American food. Tasy food. Bathrooms are small but fairly clean.
Been many times. Owners warm & welcoming. El Salvadoran pizza. Just wonderful, w/topping varieties not available elsewhere. Full pizzas to by-the-slice. Delivery available.
Yummy Popeye Calzone, cheese pizza, and Greek Salad - all were great portions for hungry family. Thanks!
Their buffalo chicken is on another plane of reality.

Just ordered a 16" pepperoni pizza and 10 wings online...the topping was good cheese and pepperoni but the crust was the color, thickness, and texture of an asphalt shingle....blackened with enough cornmeal, so that shingle was a perfect …
Good pizza nice music
Some of the best pizza in town.
Love their Vegan options.

The popusas are meh, but the el salvador style tamales are very good! My father in law from el Salvador approves! Also the pizza is pretty good, though not the best in town. A good place to grab lunch or dinner
Pizza done right
Delicious vegan pizza options, and awesome Salvadorian food.

Great pizza with some unusual varieties - salad pizza and black bean with avocado pizzas are my favorite. The restaurant is quite small and does not have a lot of seating inside - only a handful of tables that can seat 4 people.
Not recognizable as pizza.
Probably my favorite pizza in Ithaca.  I love thin crust and they have some lovely and unusual toppings (including a tortellini pizza) and the Salvadoran food is great too.
Definitely one of the best pizza places in town!
Favorite pizza in Ithaca
Good delivery service.

Excellent Pizza every time! Fresh basil n garlic our favorite! Been coming here for years each time we visit Ithaca. No worries the man behind the counter will make it amazing! But what's up with the cities new stupid meter parking (go back to normal meters). Great way to kill local businesses not kewl!
Wonderful great big juicy slices. I found one slice of the chicken pizza to be a complete meal well worth the price. Very nice staff too.
Favorite pizza in Ithaca.  Slices are filling.  Wide variety of toppings.
Best pizza in Ithaca...  Also try the tamales 😍
Pretty delicious vegan slices coming out of this place.  Multiple vegan options.
Love the chicken taco and buffalo chicken slices!
Very tasty.
Best pizza place in Ithaca. Also offers daiya slices.
Best pizza in town. And the El Salvadorian food is great too. I'd recommend the tamales.
Friendly, helpful, happily work with you on special orders.
Good Slices
I really liked this place. The two slice and a drink lunch special is a good deal.
Best pizza in Ithaca

This is specifically about their gluten-free pizza:  The crust, which bears a remarkable resemblance to the cardboard disk you find under frozen pizzas, obviously came out of the food service supplier's truck.  Then PA spreads tomato sauce …

I think this place makes the best pizza in town.  They are the only pizzeria in Ithaca.  They are the only one that I know of who still makes pizza with green olives.  Just the right amount of cheese and bread.
Go try the salad pizza and the black bean and avocado pizza. It's worth its weight in dough.
Really like their food from El Salvador. Their pupusas and tamales are the best Latin American food you can find around Ithaca. Pizza is also good.
thank you pizza aroma for making pizza enjoyable again!  Even if you're a vegan, they have what you need.  Something for everyone, and so much better than the chains.

If you're looking for a place that has good food & quick service this is it. If you're looking for a sterile, generic, corporate food chain atmosphere, this isn't your place. The owner makes most of the pizzas himself and uses quality …
